menu.title: 'Fitness' menu
menu.descr: The 'Fitness' menu is a new approach to cooking: more fresh vegetables and fruits. It is a product for active and healthy people. This is an absolutely new product with an optimal price and high quality!

menu.title: 'Fasting' menu
menu.descr: The 'Fasting' menu is a careful selection of ingredients: complete absence of animal products, milk made from almonds, oats, coconut or buckwheat, the right amount of protein provided by tofu and imported vegetarian steaks.

menu.title: 'Premium' menu'
menu.descr: In the 'Premium' menu, we use not only beautiful packaging design, but also high-quality food preparation. Red fish, seafood, fruits - a restaurant menu without going to a restaurant!
